title: ScreenFlow Pro - A Professional Screen Recording System
summary: Introducing ScreenFlow Pro V3.2: the ultimate screen recording system.
content:
ScreenFlow Pro is a powerful tool designed to capture high-quality screen recordings with audio. It includes features like resolution selector, mic/system audio toggles, and post-processing with FFmpeg to fix WebM durations.

This version introduces WebM to MP4 auto-conversion, a draggable floating widget, and dark mode support. ScreenFlow Pro V3.2 is your ideal companion for tutorials, webinars, or recording your daily workflow.
